ROOT.UpdateAcTower: UPDATE same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaNameSG_DEV_ACLINE_R_TOWER SET TOWERNAME={2},TOWERNO={3},STAMP={4} WHERE LINE_ID={0} AND TOWER_ID={1}
ROOT.UpdateDcTower: UPDATE same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaNameSG_DEV_DCLINE_R_TOWER SET TOWERNAME={2},TOWERNO={3},STAMP={4} WHERE LINE_ID={0} AND TOWER_ID={1}
ROOT.GetErrorTowers1: SELECT E.line_id,E.tower_id,E.err_msg,E.tower_name,E.tower_no,T.longitude,T.latitude from same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppNameYSH_ERROR_TOWER E LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaNameSG_DEV_TOWER_B T ON E.TOWER_ID=T.ID
ROOT.GetErrorTowers: select line_id,tower_id,'编号重复' as err_msg,towername,towerno,longitude,latitude from same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppNameysh_tower_repeat UNION ALL select line_id,tower_id_end,'距前杆' || distance||'米',towername,towerno_end,longitude_end,latitude_end from same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppNameysh_tower_distance where type='杆塔到杆塔' union all select line_id,tower_id_end,'距厂站' || distance||'米',towername,towerno_end,longitude_end,latitude_end from same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppNameysh_tower_distance where type='首端厂站到首端塔杆' union all select line_id,tower_id_start,'距厂站' || distance||'米',towername,towerno_start,longitude_start,latitude_start from same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppNameysh_tower_distance where type='末端杆塔到末端厂站'
